Deployment on Ubuntu 14.04 server platform in AmazonÂ¶

Update soft

sudo apt-get update

Install nginx

sudo apt-get install nginx

Install redis

sudo apt-get install redis-server

Install python tools

sudo apt-get install python-dev, python-virtualenv

Install Mysql

sudo apt-get install mysql, libmysqlclient-dev

Set remote access to mysql

nano /etc/mysql/my.cnf

comment following lines

#bind-address           = 127.0.0.1

Restart mysql server.

service mysql restart

Connect to mysql client

mysql -u root -ppassword

GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON *.* TO 'root'@'%' IDENTIFIED BY 'PASSWORD' WITH GRANT OPTION;

Install php5

sudo apt-get install php5-fpm, php5-gd, php5-mcrypt, php5-mysql

Install git

sudo apt-get install git

Generate locale

sudo locale-gen uk_UA
sudo locale-gen uk_UA.UTF-8

Add user

sudo adduser webmaster

Change user_ptr

su webmaster

Generate ssh key

ssh-keygen -t rsa

Make virtual environment

virtualenv achat_ve
cd achat_ve
source bin/activate

Install chat app

git clone git@github.com:zdimon/angular-chat.git
cd angular-chat
pip install -r requirements.txt

Install cpanel.

wget -O- https://raw.github.com/ajenti/ajenti/1.x/scripts/install-ubuntu.sh | sudo sh
apt-get install ajenti-v ajenti-v-nginx ajenti-v-mysql ajenti-v-php-fpm php5-mysql
